Ueno. | Front-end developer | Reykjavik, Iceland and San Francisco, California.

Ueno. An all-dancing, all-singing, fast-growing, full service digital agency with offices in San Francisco, New York and Reykjavík. A place where fun- and freedom-loving designers and developers work on cool projects for fantastic clients.​ We’re busy building stuff, but we can’t do it alone. So join us.

You’re a Front-End Developer. You write beautiful code. You know your tools, but you don’t let them control you. You have a good eye, and a twinkle in it. You’re quick, but not dirty. You’re smart, but not complicated. You live in Reykjavík, but you like travelling. You’re kind to waiters. You’re a girl. Or a guy — we don’t care. You call your grandma on her birthday. You like freedom and independence. You’d rather be a pirate than join the navy. And right now, you’re thinking about filling in that form down there, and telling us about yourself.
